title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Master AI model development with Amazon SageMaker AI (AIM272)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 掌握 AI 模型开发 (AIM272)
abstract: Unlock the full potential of AI model customization with Amazon SageMaker AI. This session explores SageMaker AI's comprehensive model development tools, highlighting how it caters to any use case - from hands-on compute control to fully managed solutions. Dive into key features like Amazon Nova customization, end to end development with HyperPod, and flexible development environments. Listen to our customers share their journey, demonstrating how SageMaker AI accelerates AI innovation while optimizing resource utilization.
abstract_cn: 通过Amazon SageMaker AI释放AI模型定制的全部潜力。本次会议探讨SageMaker AI的综合模型开发工具，重点介绍它如何满足任何用例需求——从动手操作的计算控制到完全托管的解决方案。深入了解关键功能，如Amazon Nova定制、使用HyperPod进行端到端开发以及灵活的开发环境。聆听我们的客户分享他们的历程，展示SageMaker AI如何在优化资源利用的同时加速AI创新。
